lead_paragraph: Harlequins prop Joe Marler and Saracens flyhalf Owen Farrell are both free to play in their clubs' respective European finals after receiving two-week suspensions on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Marler and Farrell Free to Play in European Finals
headline.main: Marler and Farrell Free to Play in European Finals

snippet: Harlequins prop Joe Marler and Saracens flyhalf Owen Farrell are both free to play in their clubs' respective European finals after receiving two-week suspensions on Wednesday....
